item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0521; 10:04AM; 1543 W 70th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HJvvZT; Harvard Park; It took 30 firefighters 12 minutes to extinguish the flames consuming a detached two-car garage and auto inside. No spread to nearby structures. No reported injury. Cause under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E215 E266 E33 RA57 RA866 T15 T64; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0521; 09:52AM; 1543 W 70th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HJvvZT; Harvard Park; Detached garage to the rear, fully engulfed in flames.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E215 E266 E33 RA57 RA866 T15 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1557; 08:38PM; 9900 N Winnetka Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MU7ZKj; Chatsworth; A multi-vehicle collision resulted in LAFD firefighters performing a physical extrication operation, and transporting two patients in at least serious condition. Sadly, one victim was killed in the crash. LAPD #4192.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E104 E107 E28 E296 EM17 HR3 RA107 RA70 RA73 T96 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Vehicle vs Structure; INC#1483; 07:57PM; 256 E 95th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zGzFPX; #BroadwayManchester; *Tentative Address* One vehicle collided with a two-story residential structure, compromising the integrity of the building, and cutting off access to the staircase leading from the second floor (occupied). One non-ambulatory person will be rescued via litter basket, and the other occupants will be guided down the aerial ladder, as their only path of egress (stairs) has been damaged and blocked. Thankfully, no reported injuries. LAPD Inc #4028. Building and Safety notified/responding.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E21 E221 RA246 RA264 T21; CH4; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1406; 06:10PM; EB 118 Fwy x Woodley Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IyJilf; #GranadaHills; At least three vehicles were involved in a collision, which killed one person and sent two more to the hospital in fair condition. No extrication required. CHP Log 2037. Nothing further.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E275 E287 E7 EM15 RA18 RA87 RA90 T75 T87; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1196; 06:12PM; 722-1/2 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39qyhWT; #DowntownLA; *Corrected Address* LAFD responded to the two-story (residential over commercial) building, where several adjacent occupancies were on fire. Over 100 firefighters responded and with a coordinated effort, extinguished the flames in 53 minutes. One firefighter sustained a minor injury and no occupants were injured. Crews will remain on scene for an extended overhaul operations, as hot spots remain trapped under debris. The cause of the fire is under investigation. ; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC18 BC2 CE59 CM22 E10 E15 E17 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E205 E209 E210 E215 E220 E221 E226 E233 E26 E4 E46 E5 E6 E9 EA1 EA2 EM13 EM9 HR3 PH1 RA10 RA11 RA209 RA809 SQ21 T1 T10 T15 T2 T20 T21 T26 T3 T33 T5 T9 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1196; 05:19PM; 600 E Agatha St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39qyhWT; Downtown; Smoke showing from a two-story building (one story of residential over one story of commercial occupancy) with reports of residents still inside. Firefighters are cutting holes in the roof for vertical ventilation to improve conditions inside, as crews enter with hose lines for fire attack and search & rescue.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC14 BC18 BC2 CM22 E10 E15 E17 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E205 E209 E210 E215 E220 E221 E26 E4 E5 E9 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA10 RA11 RA209 RA809 SQ21 T1 T10 T15 T2 T20 T21 T3 T5 T9 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0376; 06:45AM; 2698 N Commonwealth Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3twp2vg; #GriffithPark; Firefighters hiked in to a remote location near Griffith Park to find one adult female with a lower extremity injury. LAFD Air Operations hoisted and transported her by air to a local hospital. Nothing further.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E235 E6 H0A H2 H4 HA2 HA4 RA56 RH114 T35 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#0148; 02:07AM; 14500 W Chase St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39k00J4; #PanoramaCity; LAFD Ambulance stolen minutes earlier from Sherman Oaks Hospital, was being pursued by LAPD when it collided with two civilian vehicles (Pickup Truck and SUV), causing non-life threatening injury to a total of four female civilians, including the suspect. No LAFD or LAPD injury. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #549); FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E90 EM14 EM15 RA39 RA7 RA81 RA90 RA98 T90; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Hazardous Materials Investigation; INC#1162; 07:00PM; 333 Universal Hollywood Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mH2SCA; #StudioCity; A thorough inspection and methodical evaluation of the hotel room in question by an LAFD Hazardous Materials team yielded an unspecified quantity of black tar heroin, within which was a barely discernable trace of fentanyl sensed only by comprehensive instrumental testing. No other person than the young adult male hotel room occupant required medical attention or complained of any illness. The man was taken to an area hospital in fair condition. No escalating or off-site hazard was identified. Contrary to public rumor, LAFD Hazmat experts did NOT discover any "white powder" or "powdered substance" within the hotel room. L.A. County Health Hazmat has taken control of the scene, and will coordinate any remediation necessary. Media Inquiries: LAPD North Hollywood Division (Incident 2763) and L.A. County Health Hazmat.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E287 E86 EM11 JT4 JT6 RA76 RA86 SQ87 T87; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey
